message: Hi Bob, I'm looking to sell this great product, and I think it would be perfect for you. I'm offering it to you for $200. What do you think?
Hi Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the product, but I was hoping to stay within my budget. Would it be possible to negotiate the price down to $160?
Hi Bob, I understand your budget constraints, but $200 is my bottom line. I'm confident this product will be a valuable asset to you. Let me know if you change your mind!
